divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking in Emmaus, PA, happened to look up and saw an aerial equilateral triangle with lights on its edges moving south slowly without noise. This seemed to be the same object that I had seen in Bethlehem, PA in 2000. I thought that it was odd that I saw the same object moving at the same speed again and I again wanted it to land so I could meet the occupants. I had no fear, just heightened curiosity.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Emmaus
There were no other sightings in Emmaus on or around August 18th 2007
Summary: Aerial triangular object with lights on edges moving slowly without noise.
